title: No wonder why RIOT is making another client // Fix your queue ups
body: This client is literally garbage, I crash every time in champ select and lose the LP and waste time, and when I don't crash I get queued up with like bronze players. Can anyone explain this??!?!

replies.body:
This client lacks feature support, but it is not unstable. Of all the time i played ranked this season it did not even crash once.

This is most probably a problem on your side, i suggest to investigate.

Crashes during champ select are almost always related to an issue with the connection to the server. Conflicting network settings that are local to your PC are the most common cause, so I encourage you to work through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
